data.enText: to find new people to join a company, an organization, the armed forces, etc.

data.chText: 警察机关正试图从少数民族中征募更多的新警员。
data.enText: The police are trying to recruit more officers from ethnic minorities.

data.chText: 他们吸收了几名新成员进入俱乐部。
data.enText: They recruited several new members to the club.
He's responsible for recruiting at all levels.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式
动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: to persuade sb to do sth, especially to help you

data.chText: 我们被找来帮着给蔬菜去皮。
data.enText: We were recruited to help peel the vegetables.
to form a new army, team, etc. by persuading new people to join it
a person who has recently joined the armed forces or the police

data.chText: 他轻蔑地称我们是新兵娃娃。
data.enText: He spoke of us scornfully as raw recruits (= people without training or experience) .
a person who joins an organization, a company, etc.

data.chText: 吸引新成员进入护理行业的努力
data.enText: attempts to attract new recruits to the nursing profession

ex.enText: He enlisted at the age of 18.
He was enlisted into the navy.

ex.chText: 她在一家职业介绍所登记谋求秘书职位。
ex.enText: She enrolled with an employment agency for a secretarial job.

ex.chText: 学院将于8月份招收新生。
ex.enText: The college will enrol new students in August.

synonyms.bx: 通常指吸收新成员、招收新生、登记学习某一课程等。

ex.chText: 我的公司难以招募到素质好的职员。
ex.enText: My company is having difficulties in recruiting well-qualified staff.

ex.chText: 他的工作是为陆军募兵。
ex.enText: His job is to recruit for the army.

synonyms.bx: 多指招募新员工、新成员、新兵等。

tr: any new member or supporter (as in the armed forces)
cause to assemble or enlist in the military

example: The lab director recruited an able crew of assistants

tr: register formally as a participant or member
example: The party recruited many new members

value.def: If you recruit people for an organization, you select them and persuade them to join it or work for it.

example.ex: The police are trying to recruit more black and Asian officers...
example.tran: 警方正在试图招募更多黑人和亚裔警官。

example.ex: In recruiting students to Computer Systems Engineering, the University looks for evidence of all-round ability...
example.tran: 在招收计算机系统工程专业的学生时，这个大学看重的是学生的综合能力。

example.ex: He helped to recruit volunteers to go to Pakistan to fight.
example.tran: 他协助招募志愿者到巴基斯坦打仗。

example.ex: A bomb exploded at an army recruiting office.
example.tran: 一颗炸弹在一个军队征兵办公室爆炸了。

value.def: A recruit is a person who has recently joined an organization or an army.
